label: 半蔀
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Half shutters (hajitomi) were made of lattice faced on the inside with boards.  They filled the upper part of a bay between pillars and could be opened outward in window-like fashion (p. 647n).
